Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to outreach to property owners subject to municipal property taxes

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the public recording of tax liens

Items.MatterName: Providing notification to council members of the recording of certain real estate instruments.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notifying interested parties of the recording of certain real estate instruments

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation allowing for property owners who receive tax exemptions to have the exemption apply retroactively where eligible.
Items.MatterName: Allowing for property owners who receive tax exemptions to have the exemption apply retroactively where eligible.
